item.title: Learning Golang (some rough notes) - S01E03 - Maps
item.description: Note Learning Go : Background ðŸ‘‰ A Tour of Go : Exercise - Maps Implement WordCount This is probably bread-and-butter for any seasoned programmer, but I enjoyed the simple process and satisfaction of breaking the problem down into steps to solve using what the tutorial had just covered. Sketching out the logic in pseudo-code first, I figured that I wanted to do this:
